events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on April 30th resulting in significant front-end damage.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident to ensure the appropriate handling and assessment by the auto claims team.
An agent specializing in auto accident claims was assigned to manage the claim and assist the customer throughout the process.
Acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the customer that their case would be given prompt attention and priority.
Requested customer to submit photographs of the damaged vehicle and police accident report for investigation purposes.
Received all requested documents from the customer including vehicle photos and official police report without delay.
Initiated investigation to verify the circumstances of the collision and assess coverage eligibility under policy terms.
Completed detailed investigation confirming the incident qualifies under policy coverage with no discrepancies found.
Proposed a settlement amount reflecting the repair costs evaluated by the approved assessment center.
Customer provided positive feedback regarding the clarity of communication and fairness of the settlement offer.
Approved the claim for the agreed settlement amount to facilitate prompt repair and restoration of the vehicle.
Issued payment electronically to the customer’s designated bank account to cover the approved repair costs.
Officially closed the claim file after confirming the customer’s receipt of payment and no further queries outstanding.
Archived the case records in compliance with internal data retention policies for future reference if required.
